divs: sighting detailsdriviang to school i observed a white triangle flying in and out of the clouds when it suddenly disappeared. it didn't go behind a cloud, it literally was flying in bright blue sky and it became invisible \ was not there anymore. it was was a bizarre triangle like shape, unlike anything i've ever seen before.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Scarborough
There were no other sightings in Scarborough on or around March 21st 2012
